comment: This woman is on a power trip. In her eyes, she is always right and everyone else is wrong and below her. She grades VERY unfairly. "This is college, if you get an A, there's no room for improvement!" There's something wrong with this woman. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS! Seriously. Don't.

Worst teacher on the planet. I am the kind of person that ALWAYS comes to class no matter what and always gets A's, but in this case, that doesnt help at all. She grades essays and papers unfairly and even if its perfect, she takes off 20 points because as she says "College isnt perfect and you'll never get the perfect grade". DO NOT TAKE THIS CLAS
Do NOT take this class if want a good GPA. Hands down the worst class I've taken so far at Ksu avoid at all cost. She attendance mandatory but nothing she teaches has anything to do with the test.

Has the strangest test-taking strategy in the world: puts it up on the projector, waits for everyone to finish the 4 questions shown, then goes to next 4. Unless you memorize the chapters, you will fail due to her inability to emphasize which points will be tested on. Students basically teach themselves & eachother. Wish I chose another class.

She takes herself too seriously considering this is the easiest class @ KSU. She has an attitude when the students ask question and answers as if she's trying to make them feel stupid. As for the class.. It really is a joke but mandatory for some. Just makes it all the more painful to go when the teacher is full of herself.

WORSE TEACHER EVER!  If I combined all the bad qualities of all my teacher it still wouldn't equal her.  LETS just say that EVERYONE in BOTH her classes BOMBED her first test which is 1/5 of the TOTAL GRADE, "NO CURVE". Totally study the book that is where all the questions come from. She gives NO FEEDBACK your papers come back clear. Don't TAKE!!!

By far the worst professor i've ever had. Very disorganized, late to class quite often, tests are random and much harder than they should be. She doesn't listen if you're confused or have a question. She gives grades, but gives 0 feedback on all class work. If i had known how she was in the beginning, i would have dropped her class.

Very boring class! She's often very unclear about what she wants, so some ppl got bad grades. I would not recommend her, if you can take another teacher do it. She didnt leave the classroom when we were evaluating her (even though she's suppossed to and we asked her to do it)she kept walking around. BAD teaching methods!

Do not recommend. Tough to rate. She's an extremely nice person, but her style is too old-school for this class. Attendance mandatory. Come in, sit down, be quiet. Teach from dry PPTs. Didn't always follow syllabus. Class was unprepared for 1st test. I'd like to see what she could do with a more thought-provoking subject with a structured format.

She is very nice as a person but very unclear of what assignments need to be done. Her tests are worded differently from the text book and are somewhat hard. The majority of the class failed the first one. The class is very boring and pointless. I reccommend you take this class with another professor if you want to SUCCEED.
